results.title: Effects of atenolol and diltiazem on exercise tolerance and ambulatory ischaemia.
results.text_hl: Time to onset of 1-mm @DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@ST@@@-@<m>DISEASE_Segmentation_syndrome_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537538 @@@segment depression@@@ was longer with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (P < 0.02) and combination therapy (P < 0.01) than with @CHEMICAL_Diltiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004110 @@@diltiazem@@@.

citations.NLM: Steffensen R, Grande P, Pedersen F, Haunsø S. Effects of atenolol and diltiazem on exercise tolerance and ambulatory ischaemia. Int J Cardiol. 1993 Jul 1;40(2):143-53. PMID: 8349377
citations.BibTeX: @article{8349377, title={Effects of atenolol and diltiazem on exercise tolerance and ambulatory ischaemia.}, author={Steffensen R and Grande P and Pedersen F and Haunsø S}, journal={Int J Cardiol}, volume={40}, number={2}, pages={143-53}}

results.title: Determination of the anti-ischemic activity of nebivolol in comparison with atenolol.
results.text_hl: Exercise testing 3 h after the first dose showed a more marked ST@<m>DISEASE_Segmentation_syndrome_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537538 @@@-segment reduction@@@ by @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ than by @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@ (59% vs. 18%).

citations.NLM: Ruf G, Trenk D, Jähnchen E, Roskamm H. Determination of the anti-ischemic activity of nebivolol in comparison with atenolol. Int J Cardiol. 1994 Mar 1;43(3):279-85. PMID: 7910155
citations.BibTeX: @article{7910155, title={Determination of the anti-ischemic activity of nebivolol in comparison with atenolol.}, author={Ruf G and Trenk D and Jähnchen E and Roskamm H}, journal={Int J Cardiol}, volume={43}, number={3}, pages={279-85}}
